description:
A new feature of showing the runreports was added during GSoC. 

The task is to document the abovementioned feature in the official documentation: https://mifosforge.jira.com/wiki/spaces/docs/pages/76873780/Mifos+Android+Client+User+Guide

Follow the steps to build the app with the feature:
 - Clone the app from https://github.com/tarun0/android-client/ in Android Studio by opening File -> New -> Project from Version Control -> Github. Then enter the link `https://github.com/tarun0/android-client.git`
 - Make sure you are on `run` branch. In the android studio's `Terminal`, type `git checkout run`
 - Run the app. You'll find the `Runreports` in the Navigation Drawer on the homescreen of the app.

*Add screenshots/GIF/screencasts to elucidate the feature.*

NOTE: To request write privileges, open the above-mentioned link and create an account. After creating the account, email to `edcable@mifos.org` requesting edit permissions.

You may find some relevant info at https://mifosforge.jira.com/wiki/spaces/docs/pages/67141766/Standard+Reports+Shipped+in+Mifos+X
name: Document 'Runreport' feature
